items.name: PostgreSQL
items.description: PostgreSQL is a powerful and full features open source relational database.  Add PostGIS for extremely efficinet spatial queries and operations.

items.name: MySQL
items.description: MySQL is the most popular open-source database, especially for web development.

items.name: SQL Server
items.description: SQL Server is a relational database management system developed by Microsoft.

items.name: MongoDB
items.description: MondgoDB is the leading NoSQL, document database, written in C++.  It even supports spatial indexing and queries.

items.name: Redis
items.description: Redis is an open-source key-value cache and store, often called a data structure server.
